SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

prototype.commodities.dataaccess
Class Commodity

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--prototype.commodities.dataaccess.Commodity
public class Commodity
extends java.lang.Object

The Commodity class is a table lookup of the variety of representations of the information that defines a commodity regardless of the particular monthly contract that is being traded.

Author:
J.R. Titko

JAN

public static final int JAN
Bit map for the month of January. This is used as a mask to the valid months of a commoidity.

Constructor Detail

Commodity

public Commodity(java.lang.String symbol,
                 java.lang.String exchange,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String unitType,
                 int unitSize,
                 java.lang.String unitPrice,
                 double tickSize,
                 double tickPrice,
                 int tickDailyLimit,
                 int standardPrice,
                 int displayDecimals)
Creates a new commodity with the minimum amount of information required when setting up a new commodity.

Parameters:
symbol - The symbol for the commodity
exchange - The exchange that the commodity is traded on
name - The name of the commodity
unitType - The type of units the contract is measured in
unitSize - The number of units in a contract
unitPrice - The type of units the prices is recorded in (cents, dollars, etc)
tickSize - The size of a single tick
tickPrice - The monetary value of a tick
tickDailyLimit - The maximum number of ticks a commodity may move in a day
standardPrice - The standard price of a contract for this commodity
displayDecimals - The number of decimal places to display

Commodity

public Commodity(java.lang.String symbol,
                 java.lang.String exchange,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String unitType,
                 int unitSize,
                 java.lang.String unitPrice,
                 double tickSize,
                 double tickPrice,
                 int tickDailyLimit,
                 int standardPrice,
                 int displayDecimals,
                 int tradeMonthMask)
Creates a new commodity with a mask of commodity trading months. The mask is a representation of what months can be traded by using the constant variables for the months in a binary or (|).

Parameters:
symbol - The symbol for the commodity
exchange - The exchange that the commodity is traded on
name - The name of the commodity
unitType - The type of units the contract is measured in
unitSize - The number of units in a contract
unitPrice - The type of units the prices is recorded in (cents, dollars, etc)
tickSize - The size of a single tick
tickPrice - The monetary value of a tick
tickDailyLimit - The maximum number of ticks a commodity may move in a day
standardPrice - The standard price of a contract for this commodity
displayDecimals - The number of decimal places to display
tradeMonthMask - The months that this commodity is traded in

Commodity

public Commodity(java.lang.String symbol,
                 java.lang.String exchange,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String unitType,
                 int unitSize,
                 java.lang.String unitPrice,
                 double tickSize,
                 double tickPrice,
                 int tickDailyLimit,
                 int standardPrice,
                 int displayDecimals,
                 java.lang.String openOutcrySymbol,
                 java.lang.String acmSymbol,
                 int tradeMonthMask)
Creates a new commodity with the open outcry symbol, acm symbol, and a mask of commodity trading months. The mask is a representation of what months can be traded by using the constant variables for the months in a binary or (|).

Parameters:
symbol - The symbol for the commodity
exchange - The exchange that the commodity is traded on
name - The name of the commodity
unitType - The type of units the contract is measured in
unitSize - The number of units in a contract
unitPrice - The type of units the prices is recorded in (cents, dollars, etc)
tickSize - The size of a single tick
tickPrice - The monetary value of a tick
tickDailyLimit - The maximum number of ticks a commodity may move in a day
standardPrice - The standard price of a contract for this commodity
displayDecimals - The number of decimal places to display
openOutcrySymbol - The symbol used for open outcry
acmSymbol - The symbol used for the ACM
tradeMonthMask - The months that this commodity is traded in

Commodity

public Commodity(java.lang.String symbol,
                 java.lang.String exchange,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String unitType,
                 int unitSize,
                 java.lang.String unitPrice,
                 double tickSize,
                 double tickPrice,
                 int tickDailyLimit,
                 int standardPrice,
                 int displayDecimals,
                 java.lang.String openOutcrySymbol,
                 java.lang.String acmSymbol,
                 int tradeMonthMask,
                 java.lang.String databaseSymbol)
Creates a new commodity with the open outcry symbol, acm symbol, and a mask of commodity trading months. The mask is a representation of what months can be traded by using the constant variables for the months in a binary or (|).

Parameters:
symbol - The symbol for the commodity
exchange - The exchange that the commodity is traded on
name - The name of the commodity
unitType - The type of units the contract is measured in
unitSize - The number of units in a contract
unitPrice - The type of units the prices is recorded in (cents, dollars, etc)
tickSize - The size of a single tick
tickPrice - The monetary value of a tick
tickDailyLimit - The maximum number of ticks a commodity may move in a day
standardPrice - The standard price of a contract for this commodity
displayDecimals - The number of decimal places to display
openOutcrySymbol - The symbol used for open outcry
acmSymbol - The symbol used for the ACM
tradeMonthMask - The months that this commodity is traded in
databaseSymbol - The special symbol used for DB access

getTradeMonthMask

public int getTradeMonthMask()
Get the months the commodity is traded as a series of bits. Use the month constants (JAN, FEB, MAR, APR, MAY, JUN, JUL, AUG, SEP, OCT, NOV, DEC) to check if a month is traded for this commodity.

Returns:
the bit representation of the trading months

Returns:
the special DB symbol or commodity symbol for the commodity

getContract

public Contract getContract(java.lang.String contractMonth)
Get a specific contract within this commodity. The contractMonth variable must be of the format returned by Contract.getMonthAsKey.

Parameters:
contractMonth - The month of the contract to be retrieved.
Returns:
The contract if it exists or null.
See Also:
Contract.getMonthAsKey

getContracts

public java.util.Iterator getContracts()
Get all contracts within this commodity.

Returns:
The iterator to the contracts.

clearContracts

public void clearContracts()
Removes all contracts associated with this commodity from the internal list. The next access for contracts will then be a fresh retrieval.

loadContracts

private void loadContracts()
Load the contracts that go with this commodity into memory.

formatPrice

public java.lang.String formatPrice(double price)
Format a price to the appropriate number of decimal places so that the number of decimal places are fixed even if they end in zeros.

Parameters:
price - the price to be formatted
Returns:
the formatted price

bySymbol

public static Commodity bySymbol(java.lang.String symbol)
Retrieve a Commodity object by using the commodity symbol.

Parameters:
symbol - the commodity symbol
Returns:
a Commodity object of the requested commodity

byNameExchange

public static Commodity byNameExchange(java.lang.String nameExchange)
Retrieve a Commodity object by using the commodity name and exchange.

Parameters:
nameExchange - the commodity name and exchange
Returns:
a Commodity object of the requested commodity

getNameMap

public static java.util.Map getNameMap()
Retrieve a map keyed on the names of the available commodities with Commodity objects as associated values.

Returns:
a map containing all Commodities keyed by name

loadTable

private static void loadTable()
Load the Commodity table and store it to be keyed by symbol.

editCommodity

public static void editCommodity(Commodity commodity)
Add or update a commodity in the lookup table.

Parameters:
commodity - the commodity that changed or should be added
